```{r}
devtools::load_all('.')
library(dplyr)

arqs_pag <- dir('../data-raw/2017', full.names = TRUE, pattern = '^pag') %>% 
  normalizePath()
arqs_p <- dir('../data-raw/2017', full.names = TRUE, pattern = '_p_') %>% 
  normalizePath()

d_processos <- parse_jurisprudencia(arqs_p)
d_pags <- parse_jurisprudencia_pags(arqs_pag)


```

```{r}
d_final <- consolidar(d_pags = d_pags, d_proc = d_processos)
```
